result.arabic_text: وَيَدۡعُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ بِٱلشَّرِّ دُعَآءَهُۥ بِٱلۡخَيۡرِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَجُولٗا
result.translation: 11. Seehadayti tuk teyna yanqibe waqdi isi nafsii kee isi ahali abaara iggimaa kee Qataatakoh, isi nafsii kee isi ahlih isi Rabbi kayri kah esserannah, seehadayti usuk qaxbaxxaago li kinni.
